website_summaries.verdict: Another inexpensive product showcasing a lightweight design among admirable comfort and functionality.
pros: Designed for both men and women in style and fit
Many full-figured women found that these wetsuit pants fit better than other similar products
Thin neoprene makes product lightweight, stretchy, and flexible
cons: Material makes annoying noise when rubbed
Some customers had issues with shipping

customer_reviews.title: You can be zaftig and active and these are the water pants to help you do it
customer_reviews.text: Woo hoo! We "full figured" women have us a pair of wetsuit pants which actually fit. The legs are a little long (I'm 5'4") but that is okay because the rest of it stretches to protect my generously proportioned thighs, calves and butt. I wore this kayaking and it was perfect. Kept me dry but not all hot and sweaty.
customer_reviews.author: Nyla McCarthy

customer_reviews.title: Great for curvy ladies!
customer_reviews.text: Im 5’5” 240lbs they fit me perfect. Hips, curves and thick calves and felt great. Tight as they should be but able to move around nicely. Im so impressed with product and price is unreal. I will use for scuba diving. It’s hard to find plus size in scuba gear period.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sizing very accurate
customer_reviews.text: Bought these to get more months of use out of the pool . Recovereing from hip replacement and want to get flexibility back so doing a lot of leg excercises and Aquajogging. Really researched and decided on 1.5mm thickness. Pool was 60 and weight was perfect. Took chill off very quickly. Very supple due to weight, so easy on and off. 150lb . 39” hip, 32 waist, unisex sizing and bought a Med. my husband also tried on and Med fit him too. 5’7” 162lbs 32 waist!. Can’t go wrong for price
customer_reviews.author: lisa

customer_reviews.title: Fit Well Even In 3X, Works Great, Just Wish Ankles Were Tighter
customer_reviews.text: Although these are a little annoying to get into, they aren't as bad as a lot of pants made out of this material. They are warm and waterproof - IF you put tension bands around the ankles. The ankles flare out so much that water just pours right into the pants and travels right up to your butt. So that's not so fun. I wish they were tight around the ankles to prevent that happening. Otherwise they do the job without being too rigid or horrible to get in or out of, even if you are a 3X.
customer_reviews.author: Witwer & Vess

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for kayaking!
customer_reviews.text: These are quality neoprene pants. They are well made. I had originally ordered the 3 mm but found they bunched behind the knees. These 1.5 mm are the perfect thickness for kayaking. Some reviewers complained about the smell. Yes, they do have a smell, but that is the typical neoprene material smell, which will fade with time. I am a 156 lb female who is 5' 11" and the XL fit me perfectly. They would be a tiny bit too big if I wanted them as scuba pants, but I am using them for kayaking so I wanted a little bit of moving space. I tried many brands and sizes and these fit the bill for me, very happy!
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn A.

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed
customer_reviews.text: I use these as a lightweight option in my self bailing packraft. I needed something less bulky than a full wetsuit or drysuit when hiking in long distances over rugged terrain. These fit the bill! They pack very small and weigh very little. I am 6' tall, 31" waist, 160lbs and the small fits perfect. I've worn them for 5 days straight sitting in 60oF water and was relatively comfortable. Most of my discomfort can be attributed to my choice of top layer.
customer_reviews.author: Ryhar

customer_reviews.title: Item arrived with a tear, poor craftsmanship.
customer_reviews.text: Item arrived (today) on time as stated. Unfortunately I didn't get the opportunity to wear them. Their was a 2" tear defect in the left leg of the pants. Poor craftsmanship, this will lead to further damage of the pants. Item being returned. I will update this review soon.
customer_reviews.author: KP

customer_reviews.title: Oh my goodness
customer_reviews.text: i have not worn these yet but I am excited to try them. I do Aqua Fit and Aqua Zumba. I have a hard time controlling my body temperature. I have been searching for something that will keep me warm in the water. After doing some searching these came up. I was kind of not sure if they would fit. I am 5ft3 and weigh 330lbs. Normally I would not share that but I want help someone else. The fit perfect. I will add a picture later
customer_reviews.author: Chelle Renee

customer_reviews.title: Will fit a short person
customer_reviews.text: I am female, 4'11", 116 lbs. These pants were made for a man but they fit me pretty good. The size small is slightly roomy on me but definitely not "baggy." The length is fine - I do not have to turn up the cuff, which was a surprise. I know they stretch but I am not sure how this would fit a tall person. I haven't actually used them yet, thus the 4 stars. In any event, I am very pleased with this purchase so far.
customer_reviews.author: DJ-Miami

customer_reviews.title: A great pair of wetsuit pants for paddling.
customer_reviews.text: I really like these pants. They are extremely warm even in 65 degrees air temp with 50 degree water soaking them as I paddle. After you wear them a few times they really soften up and become like a second skin. They don't feel restrictive or scrunch up behind my knees. I like that they are high waisted to flatter my thick curves. I sit, stand and kneel transitioning odten
customer_reviews.author: PookieAndTheBear_com

customer_reviews.title: Keeps you warm and dry...buy one size bigger
customer_reviews.text: These run small...so order a size up! We ordered a size up and got worried when they came and looked even smaller than what we figured if we ordered what size he wears...no worries they stretched and fit perfect. He fishes and hunts in cold wet weather sometimes. His waders leak all the time and even when they don't he gets cold I got these to wear with waterproof socks under the waders and it was perfect. They did exactly as expected. They kept him warm and dry and comfortable. He was super pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen trout

customer_reviews.title: Fit me fine. 5’9” 160lbs 32” waist 35” hips 34” inseam. Thick material.
customer_reviews.text: Fit me. 5’9” 160lb athletic build. 32” waist 35” hips. Will use in Michigan next week kayaking. Only issue I was concerned about is the feeling behind my knees. If they will put pressure and irritate. Pants are thicker and will do the job tho.
customer_reviews.author: JLW

customer_reviews.title: Great for added layer of protection.
customer_reviews.text: I used these under my 7mm semi drysuit as an added layer of protection. My diving conditions were a bit extreme... rougly 240 miles above the arctic circle (Tromso, Norway) in mid January. Water temp was around 40 degrees Fahrenheit and air temp was in the teens. They worked as advertised and that's all I needed them to do. Didnt feel the cold at all... at least not while in the water. In the zodiac with the wind hitting me was a different story lol.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Hutton

customer_reviews.title: nice pants, but order up!
customer_reviews.text: I actually returned these pants because I had ordered another pair that I liked better. These were just a little too small, so order up people! I think you would need 1 to 2 sizes above what you would normally wear. One size up from what the size table in the description recommends. These fit below the waist, also. If I had ordered a size up, I probably would have kept them.
customer_reviews.author: aglore

customer_reviews.title: Wetsuit pants
customer_reviews.text: Quality pants! The material is not a cheap neoprene and is well stitched. The waist drawstring seems adequate also..time will tell. The fit is decent. I am a 5'4" 130 female and these were listed as unisex. I got the size small which fit pretty well except in the crotch, which was a bit large, indicating to me that these are probably more suited for a male. I easily took in that area and they are good for my needs!
customer_reviews.author: M. A. Carithers

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value!
customer_reviews.text: I loved these so much and was so shocked at the low price for such great quality that I also bought a pair of the 3mm (see that review). I use the 1.5mm for early fall and late spring kayaking on an inland lake: The right temp for my using them seems to be about 55-65°. The 1.5mm isn't reinforced in the knees and rear (as is the 3mm), but no big deal for me. I love the back waist that extends over/up the small of my back! Very comfortable. Perfect for kayaking!
customer_reviews.author: KB

customer_reviews.title: Great fit, kept me warm & dry
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable and warm. Kept my skin dry. I’m very curvy and while I had to pull to get them over my hips, they fit great, including when wet. I also tried the thicker 3mm but the 1.5mm was plenty thick enough for what I needed them for. Great price. Bought 3X, for 5’, 200 lb.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca LTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: These pants feel great!
customer_reviews.text: I actually haven't worn them in the water yet but they feel great next to my skin, and they are thick enough but flexible enough that I think they are going to work great for me. I'm short so they are too long and I'm heavy, so they require some pulling and tugging, but I think they are a great buy for the price most especially. I will update my review if I find a problem with them.
customer_reviews.author: Hollyreubens

customer_reviews.title: Impressed
customer_reviews.text: I'm 175lbs 5 10 and ordered a Medium. Fits perfectly. Main use will be night kayak fishing in cold water. This will do the trick
customer_reviews.author: clotilde s. palermo

customer_reviews.title: They fit to US sizes
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical about the fit because I have long skinny legs with with a “mid section” but they fit great 😁 they don’t cut into your skin and are plenty long enough for me ... happy with this purchase 😁
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen Decker

customer_reviews.title: very good for the money, nice waist regulation, but uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: very good for the money, nice having a cord for waist regulation, but quite uncomfortable. the other brand sold at the same price does not have the waist regulation but it's much more comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Vittorix

customer_reviews.title: Great for surf fishing in December
customer_reviews.text: I insisted on buying these for my husband when we went surf-fishing in December, and I tried them on myself. It was awesome to be able to enjoy standing in the water, even though it was chilly. It was about 45-60 degrees out, varying from nice to cold when the wind blew. My husband is big guy, and they worked well for him.
customer_reviews.author: CuriousMind

customer_reviews.title: Great and Perfect
customer_reviews.text: It fit just like I wanted and under water it makes you feel more than comfortable it is my first time that I buy one of this and in my opinion I'll buy an other one when this ones brake that maybe it would hapend in 1 year maybe cause I use to get out of the water very brutally so that is the reason, highly recommend to give it a try by yourself its my opinion
customer_reviews.author: Angel E.

customer_reviews.title: Fits good
customer_reviews.text: I'm 5'8", 205 lbs. Size 36×30 pants. Xl fits good.
customer_reviews.author: Fuzzy

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I ordered 2 pairs. One for myself , I am a female 168 lbs and 5'6"., I orderded myself a Large. They fit me perfect. My daughter 5'3" 125lbs. I ordered her a Small and they fit her perfectly! Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: ceramicsmom

customer_reviews.title: Great pants
customer_reviews.text: Fit as expected for my size. Kept me warm even in cold water. Worn numerous times and are still holding up good. Great buy
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Vardeman

customer_reviews.title: Fits as described
customer_reviews.text: Good quality. Fit is exactly as chart suggest. I can go xl or xxl in clothing. In this case probably would have been netter fit w/ xl. Impressed w/ quality for price
customer_reviews.author: crickets

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: I use these on the gauley River in September and October when it’s pretty cold - for the price you’re not going to find better gear. Yeah, if you want to plunk down $80+ you’ll get something a little better, but at the price for these you can’t go wrong.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for MN spring sailing
customer_reviews.text: Fit great, 5’10”, COVID wt 199, wearing 36/32 jeans and the XL is perfect for me, not too tight. Right temp for spring, wore dinghy sailing and used to put in the docks. Will order a pair for the gf
customer_reviews.author: joseph g

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit. Kept me nice and warm during a 7 day kayak trip in Canada. Great product
customer_reviews.author: Karen and Morris schademan

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: This is very comfortable> I used it twice now, one in the lake and one in the beach when I go fishing. I used this under the wader.
customer_reviews.author: Sonnie

customer_reviews.title: Size chart off
customer_reviews.text: Based on the size chart provided the size I ordered was one size too small...it also did not have the drawstring at the waist or even holes for one. I reordered the next larger size which will work well to keep legs dry while kayaking...this one had the drawstring. Price was very good in comparison to others I considered.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Like
customer_reviews.text: The pants fit very well. Only problem is no string in waist band to help tighten. They seem to be of quality.
customer_reviews.author: Gloria grayum

customer_reviews.title: Nice pants, Just a little bulky in the crotch ...
customer_reviews.text: Nice pants, Just a little bulky in the crotch area. Other than that, They do fit as indicated in size chart
customer_reviews.author: Tina M.

customer_reviews.title: Affordable , comfortable and warm
customer_reviews.text: Pants fits well and stretchable. Warm for pool swimming and lap swimming.
customer_reviews.author: Al

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable water pants.
customer_reviews.text: These pants are super comfortable for using with my float tube. It was hard to find a good fit for my fat, senior body, but they fit well and hopefully I can get in the water more and work on my size!
customer_reviews.author: Bird Lady

customer_reviews.title: Just what I was looking for!
customer_reviews.text: Like the fit! The fit to size scale that was on site, was spot on! They are nice and warm for 70 to 80 degree waters! Comfortable fit! At a good price! The quality is really good! Made to last!
customer_reviews.author: jn

customer_reviews.title: It looks great on him
customer_reviews.text: I buy for my boyfriend. He love it. It warms and fix great on him.
customer_reviews.author: Denise Burgos

customer_reviews.title: Great for kayaking
customer_reviews.text: These wetsuits pants kept me warm during my kayak practice in the pool that is not really heated. Even after swimming I wasn't cold and feel warm within seconds. Good quality pants. I'm 6.2' male - XL.
customer_reviews.author: Rami

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Love it! I use itina nearby lake and in my pool on cool days.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Gibbons

customer_reviews.title: Nice fit
customer_reviews.text: The pants are exactly what I needed. The size chart provided was accurate. I use these for kayaking and would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Robert E Pascal

customer_reviews.title: Way too small
customer_reviews.text: There is no way the wetsuit I received is a 3 XL. It finally dawned on me why. Made in China = a much smaller size than US. Did not attempt to try it on. I am 5’5’’ but not skinny, but would think a 3 XL would fit. Sadly, it won’t.
customer_reviews.author: Sheryl

customer_reviews.title: Good find
customer_reviews.text: They were much better than we expected for the price. Good quality and fast delivery. They fit perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Glenna Fletcher

customer_reviews.title: Smells like a rubber
customer_reviews.text: This product has a very strong rubber smell. I did not return it because I hope the smell will go away after couple uses. Fitting is good.
customer_reviews.author: EMC

customer_reviews.title: Worth trying
customer_reviews.text: I weigh 200 lb and stand 6'1" with an athletic build. Size Large fits just fine. I use these surf fishing. I wear cargo shorts over them for pockets. Very comfortable wading in 57 deg F water for hours. Good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Robotbeetle

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent! Fit perfectly, I'm 165 lbs 5' 11". Looks good! Good price!
customer_reviews.author: Yobkris

customer_reviews.title: Great quality run a little small
customer_reviews.text: Ran a little small but other than that great quality someone in the family will definitely use them for the price did not want to return
customer_reviews.author: jane

customer_reviews.title: Very gkod
customer_reviews.text: Looks very good. My kid will use it at a Regatta very soon..
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.text: Great pants for a little bit of warmth but the draw back is the keep sliding down while scuba diving
customer_reviews.author: Tanya Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: These are exactly what they said they were, but not what I needed. They're too thick for me.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy Hood

customer_reviews.title: Love these pants
customer_reviews.text: Love these pants. I do water aerobics in a cold swimming pool and these took the chill off! I did have to modify the legs and add a drawstring cuff. Other than that I am very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Jo Ann F

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, fit as expected, however did almost fall off while I was diving
customer_reviews.text: comfortable and good fit, but while diving, they started to fall off. I guess I need suspenders,
customer_reviews.author: cynthia gould

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit great quality
customer_reviews.text: Went on a fossil hunting in a river in florida. Temps were only in the 70s. Ordered these got them so quick and would not have been able to stand the water if it for these ! Perfect fit !
customer_reviews.author: Catherine Salemma

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Keeps me warm in the cold ocean water. The only con was the string gets loose from the spring lock
customer_reviews.author: vahe

customer_reviews.title: Keeps me dry
customer_reviews.text: The wet suite pants works great and keeps me dry. Product works as dseigned.
customer_reviews.author: Carlos Perez

customer_reviews.title: Excellent pants
customer_reviews.text: These pants are so comfortable. Size is correct and did not cause any chaffing. If you oc1 or kayak these pants are the best. I bought 3 more today!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah J.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent response time on my return
customer_reviews.text: I received the wrong size returned it and it was done in no time... Great products and I couldn't be happier with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Austin L

customer_reviews.title: Warm and com
customer_reviews.text: I love that it's comfortable and keeps me warm. It's also true to size. I'm bought mine in a large and I'm a size 10.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price
customer_reviews.text: Bought for winter sea kayaking. Fit nicely and seems like a good value
customer_reviews.author: Derek Hopp

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: True to size. Very Comfortable! I wear them for my Aqua Fit class.
customer_reviews.author: Rhonda R Wilcox

customer_reviews.title: Good fit
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable and can move easily in them. I'm 6ft 200lbs. Fit well maybe just a little loose on the lower leg, but overall very happy. Use them for Kayak fishing
customer_reviews.author: RB

customer_reviews.title: If you like a really tight fit with this type of pant, order the next size down
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I expected. Really enjoying the item. Great fit
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: I like : Fast shipping Very good quality Deslike : I ordered size xxxl and its was big for me I thought the size will be fit for me
customer_reviews.author: sultan

customer_reviews.title: Great for OC paddling in cold water and air
customer_reviews.text: Use for Outrigger Canoe paddling in central CA they keep my bottoms toasty in cool weather and water.
customer_reviews.author: Reid Nelson

customer_reviews.title: They seem to be a good quality for the $$$
customer_reviews.text: Other than the fit being true I can't give much of a review as I haven't paddled in the yet. They seem to be a good quality for the $$$.
customer_reviews.author: ScottP

customer_reviews.title: Warm and dry!
customer_reviews.text: They were warm and kept us dry while kayaking. Made our favorite pastime enjoyable.
customer_reviews.author: Martin R Genett

customer_reviews.title: Excellent wetsuit pants - be careful with sizing
customer_reviews.text: I am 6'0", 31 waist and 155 lbs. I first ordered medium and they were "loose" fitting. I sent them back--and I must say EXCELLENT customer service. Quick refund. Then I ordered a small and now that I have the right size, I cant wait to take these paddling. They will be great for NC/VA river paddling until like July when it gets nice and warm. These will be great to wear in the ocean until the temp heats up. The drawstring at the waist is a great comfort feature. Good product. Fair price. Excellent service. Keep up the good work.
customer_reviews.author: Francisco S.

customer_reviews.title: Solid product !
customer_reviews.text: Good quality product, and for the value cannot beat it.
customer_reviews.author: Andres G

customer_reviews.title: NC
customer_reviews.text: Liked them they worked out just fine for kayaking in kooler water.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan D.

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and warm , just little stiff
customer_reviews.text: Could be little more soft . Fell kind of stiff
customer_reviews.author: Gosia  Studnicki

customer_reviews.title: It fit nicely.
customer_reviews.text: I went up one size a XL and it fit perfectly I use it for exploring in the ocean .
customer_reviews.author: Clarissa P.

customer_reviews.title: Great Wetsuit Pants
customer_reviews.text: Great wetsuit pants...true fit to size chart. Will use for kayaking & snorkeling
customer_reviews.author: Becky

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Quite pleased by my purchase. Now I can Enjoy the pool.
customer_reviews.author: Voterup

customer_reviews.title: Great for temps that are in the 20s
customer_reviews.text: Using it for working outdoors when its cold out. Great for temps that are in the 20s. Not restrictive to move around in.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: After a few times using it (twice a week during ...
customer_reviews.text: After a few times using it (twice a week during a month) for sailing, its got holes in the knees.
customer_reviews.author: Matias

customer_reviews.title: Wow, great product!
customer_reviews.text: Haven't tried them in the water yet, but these medium pants fit perfectly on a 5'10" man with a 32" waist. They remind me of the O'Neal wetsuit I had a long time ago but at a fraction of the price. Now for the water test in San Diego later this month.
customer_reviews.author: Rockinchan

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and well constructed
customer_reviews.text: The fit is good. I've not been in the water with them but I fell like it meets my needs perfectly. Works well with other wet suit related Items I purchased and I expect that together they will keep my warm and comfortable. The construction looks durable.
customer_reviews.author: Philip M Ricci

customer_reviews.title: Great fit and quite warm!
customer_reviews.text: I wore these pants on a winter kayaking trip along the Texas coast in January. It was about 42 degrees when we launched, and 46 when we returned. While I was very cold overall on the trip, my legs actually felt pretty good and insulated, in spite of getting rained on and splashed. The pants are heavy enough to protect from the wind. I think they'd be perfect for a slightly warmer trip (we had been anticipating 50-60 degree weather but a storm came in). Very comfortable and a really good fit.
customer_reviews.author: S

customer_reviews.title: they keep me warm
customer_reviews.text: Use these for Kayak fishing, water is 68 degree and I'm warm. quality is good, happy with item.
customer_reviews.author: murmur

customer_reviews.title: Warm Legs, happy legs.
customer_reviews.text: In the cold "winter" months of San Diego my legs stay toasty when I go for a paddle.
customer_reviews.author: Rick Dominguez

customer_reviews.title: These will work for me.
customer_reviews.text: I need something to ware in the water when I kayak in cold water. These are good. They were long for me but I will roll them up.
customer_reviews.author: Tinkerbellchick

customer_reviews.title: Worked great, just the right amount of protection for these ...
customer_reviews.text: Just used these to dive in French Polynesia and Cook Islands. Worked great, just the right amount of protection for these waters in winter.
customer_reviews.author: G. Smoluk

customer_reviews.title: Work great, there is no way I could have stayed ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought these to wear while I clean my pool early in the year when it's cold. Work great, there is no way I could have stayed in long enough without them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pretty comfy too
customer_reviews.text: Tried them out the other day for a paddle. I walked into the cold water up to my knees and was plenty warm the entire time. Pretty comfy too!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: For plumbers?
customer_reviews.text: The draw cord device does not stay tight. The back is also kind of short. So, you end up looking like a plumber in them! Update: The draw cord is worthless. Pants are ok but very short in the back. Seams are rough on your skin.
customer_reviews.author: FrankUser

customer_reviews.title: I really like them. I haven't used them in water yet
customer_reviews.text: I'm a male 195lbs 33size waist, and I ordered a medium. Fit me perfectly. I really like them. I haven't used them in water yet, I bought these for a planned trip in the future. But they fit really well and look pretty good. No reinforced knees though. And the drawstring is fairly useless hence the 4 stars. But these are very affordable and came quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan

customer_reviews.title: Bad China smell, perfoms as expected
customer_reviews.text: Arrived with the dreaded "China plastic" gas smell. Was unbearable for almost a week. Took airing it out on a close line in to get rid of the smell. Other than that, performs well. Fits my 42" waist ok.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony W.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit, Good quality,Great price!
customer_reviews.text: I use these for Stand up padding, I love them! I think these would be great for snorkelling, paddle boarding, diving and all kinds of water sports. If you are using them for paddle boarding or something like that they would actually keep your legs completely dry. True to size neoprene wetsuit.The fit is perfect, Love the flex material, pair these with a wetsuit jacket -- warm enough yet less restrictive than a fullsuit. Very please so far!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: As advertised
customer_reviews.text: Fit well and appears to be well made. Does the job
customer_reviews.author: Mikes 205

customer_reviews.title: PROTECT YOUR SKIN!!!
customer_reviews.text: They really help protect my skin during aqua fit classes in the pool.
customer_reviews.author: ZEENA63

product_meta.title: Lemorecn Wetsuits Pants 1.5mm Neoprene Swimming Canoeing Pants
feature_bullets: INNOVATIVE TECHNOLOGY: 1.5mm ultra soft and super stretch neoprene; comfortable flat stitch construction gives you a soft and comfortable fit
WARMTH: Designed to keep you warm in all water conditions for standup paddle boarding, kiteboarding, wakeboarding, surfing, and other water sports.
PERFORMANCE AND COMFORT: Combination of two super elastic fabric gives an unparalleled mix of performance and comfort
UNISEX FIT: A layer to support men and women during paddle boarding, surfing, and other water activities.
SIZE:This is an US size wetsuit pants ,please take a look at our Size Chart picture to select the best fitting pants
